onboarding.blog_excerpt: Your store hasn’t published any blog posts yet. A blog can be used to talk about new product launches, tips, or other news you want to share with your customers. You can check out Shopify’s ecommerce blog for inspiration and advice for your own store and blog.

issued.redeem: Use this code at checkout to redeem your gift card

redeem.eligible_title: You've been gifted a $10 discount code
redeem.eligible_content: This one-time discount will be applied automatically at checkout, or you may save the code for later.
redeem.invited_title: You've been gifted a $10 discount code
redeem.invited_content: Redeem your reward now or save it for later.
redeem.ineligible_title: Not eligible to use this referral code
redeem.ineligible_content_html:
This message may be displayed if you have purchased Kate Farms before or are accessing a referral link on the device used to share it.

Only new customers are eligible to receive a referral discount.

Please contact us if you believe you are receiving this message in error.
